word_sen: The prime minister is now facing a revolt by members of his own party.
word_sen_trans: 首相现在面临着党内倒戈。
trans:
n.反抗；造反，起义
v.起义；反抗
example:
1. The prime minister is now facing a revolt by members of his own party.
首相现在面临着党内倒戈。
2. the Polish revolt of 1863
1863年的波兰起义
3. It was feared that the army would revolt against the government.
有人担心军队会挥戈反对政府。
4. Some members of the government may revolt against this proposed legislation.
一些政府成员可能会反对这项拟议中的法规。

2. All the rooms had fitted carpets (= carpets cut to fit the shape of the rooms ) .

word_sen: Yoga involves breathing exercises, stretching, and meditation.

word_sen: ‘I don’t think it’s right,’ John persisted.

如果一直痛，你就必须去看医生了。

word_sen: Road safety is taught to young children to avoid road accidents.

word_sen: If symptoms persist, consult a doctor without delay.

trans: v.请教，向...咨询；找...商量；查阅，查看
example:

如果症状持续的话，马上咨询医生。

word_sen: I think we can safely assume (=  it is almost certain  ) that interest rates will go up again soon.
word_sen_trans: 我想我们几乎可以肯定，利率很快会再次上调。
trans: v.假定，设想；开始掌管/承担责任等；假装[装出]…的态度/样子/表情等
example:
1. I think we can safely assume (=  it is almost certain  ) that interest rates will go up again soon.
我想我们几乎可以肯定，利率很快会再次上调。
2. When it got to midnight and Paul was still not back, I began to assume the worst (=  think that the worst possible thing had happened  ) .
到午夜时保罗还没回来，我就开始往最坏的地方想了。
3. Jim Paton will assume the role of managing director.
吉姆·帕顿将出任常务董事一职。
4. Andy assumed an air of indifference whenever her name was mentioned.
每次提到她的名字，安迪都装出无所谓的样子。

word_sen: It feels very cold today.

他就是在这个房间里去世的。

word_sen: Police have described the man as a violent and dangerous criminal.

word_sen: Don't push for an interview on the spot, but rather explain that you want to let them know of your interest, drop off your resume, and complete an application while you're there if possible.
word_sen_trans: 这个时候不要急着想得到面试，而是解释为你只是想让他们知道你对他们招聘的职位有兴趣，放下你的简历，然后有可能的话填完一份申请表就离开吧。
trans:
n.个人简历
v.再继续；重新开始
example:
1. Don't push for an interview on the spot, but rather explain that you want to let them know of your interest, drop off your resume, and complete an application while you're there if possible.
这个时候不要急着想得到面试，而是解释为你只是想让他们知道你对他们招聘的职位有兴趣，放下你的简历，然后有可能的话填完一份申请表就离开吧。

3. Peace talks will resume tomorrow.

word_sen: The wine is aged in oak barrels.

word_sen: The gate is made of metal.

word_sen: She uses some wonderful images and metaphors in her writing.

word_sen: She was paid a $100,000 advance for her next two novels.

word_sen: He reacted angrily to the suggestion that he had lied.

word_sen: Her husband became much more positive and was soon back in full-time employment.
